cream.title: Vatika Naturals Deep Conditioning Hammam Cream (900g) | Enriched with Olive, Almond and Henna | Promotes Silky and Shiny Hair
aboutThisItem: EXPERIENCE THE POWER OF OLIVE: Olive oil acts as a natural moisture balancer, delivering essential nourishment to your hair. It enhances strength and elasticity, supporting healthy growth and reducing breakage.
ENRICHED WITH ALMOND & HENNA EXTRACTS: Henna helps coat and protect hair, adding a natural shine, while almond extract provides vital nutrients that strengthen and soften hair from root to tip.

ULTIMATE DEEP CONDITIONING TREATMENT: This hot oil therapy penetrates deeply into the scalp and roots, restoring your hair’s natural strength and vitality. It naturally promotes longer, thicker, and softer hair.

PERFECT FOR DRY, DULL, AND DAMAGED HAIR: Transform brittle, lifeless strands into smooth, shiny, and healthy-looking hair. This nourishing formula revitalizes and strengthens hair, leaving it silky, manageable, and full of life.
HOW TO USE: 1) Apply to wet hair after shampooing. 2) Wrap hair in a hot towel and leave for 10–15 minutes. 3) Rinse thoroughly with water.
